body:
The previously mentioned erroneous behavior is not an issue anymore (I used [this](https://gist.github.com/jamesob/fe9a872051a88b2025b1aa37bfa98605) test case on platforms that support C++20).

Guix build:
```
a6bb81780d46656c825f1c25fc4d49e7f567ac07f77c0ca1d86682e0d5e3ddda  guix-build-df879e5a9113/output/dist-archive/bitcoin-df879e5a9113.tar.gz
d2c5b11be468b6da9ce4590ed04bcd862e05148a35eb116488f728bce170eeff  guix-build-df879e5a9113/output/x86_64-w64-mingw32/SHA256SUMS.part
394ef4e2a064ff701fb3f88297b495cf9437cd7c381a260e6fe517e6771b9546  guix-build-df879e5a9113/output/x86_64-w64-mingw32/bitcoin-df879e5a9113-win64-debug.zip
9bcd53a2b6102eca975f6050fa22f1b252f6d99ab5d2ad38db624159bc9df0bf  guix-build-df879e5a9113/output/x86_64-w64-mingw32/bitcoin-df879e5a9113-win64-setup-unsigned.exe
791b67eaf4136cdc9939626bddcb830e2c544f9125ac16112be5d23edd3776ff  guix-build-df879e5a9113/output/x86_64-w64-mingw32/bitcoin-df879e5a9113-win64-unsigned.tar.gz
a15124fd442b11570960f0f5925c44ffaa0a498f5be44072aea35b434408e19d  guix-build-df879e5a9113/output/x86_64-w64-mingw32/bitcoin-df879e5a9113-win64.zip
```

The `bitcoind.exe -logthreadnames` from the `bitcoin-df879e5a9113-win64.zip` runs flawlessly on Windows 11 Pro 23H2.

Fixes one item from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/29952.
title: build: Enable `thread_local` for MinGW-w64 builds
